item.title: Apollo | RemoveEventHandler bug fix
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

The remove event handler doesnâ€™t check for a full inventory or if you have the item in your inventory and it is stackable, add this in that class

boolean hasRoomForStackable = inventory.contains(event.getId()) && inventory.get(event.getSlot()).getDefinition().isStackable(); if (inventory.freeSlots() < 1 && !hasRoomForStackable) { inventory.forceCapacityExceeded(); ctx.breakHandlerChain(); return; }

Read full topic
